title: Week 1: Getting Started
excerpt: My journey begins! Set up the development environment and explored the codebase.
content:
This is the full content of the Week 1 blog post. You can use HTML here to format your text.

I started by cloning the repository and setting up the dependencies. Then I explored the existing codebase to understand the architecture.

title: Week 2: Initial Analysis
excerpt: Analyzed the requirements and created a plan for the new features.
content:
In the second week, I focused on analyzing the project requirements in detail. I created a comprehensive implementation plan and discussed it with my mentors.
